an3.18:1.1: “Sace vo, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam puccheyyum:
an3.18:1.3: Nanu tumhe, bhikkhave, evam puttha attiyeyyatha harayeyyatha jiguccheyyatha”ti?
an3.18:1.5: “Iti kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dibbena ayuna attiyatha harayatha jigucchatha, dibbena vannena dibbena sukhena dibbena yasena dibbenadhipateyyena attiyatha harayatha jigucchatha;
an3.18:1.6: pageva kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhehi kayaduccaritena attiyitabbam harayitabbam jigucchitabbam, vaciduccaritena … manoduccaritena attiyitabbam harayitabbam jigucchitabban”ti.
